Hi,

Forgive me if I am missing this functionality...  I'm wondering is it
=
possible to add decide rules and domain overrides to a remote crawl
job via=
 JMX?  If not possible with JMX, any suggestions on how to
achieve this rem=
otely without having to use the Heritrix WEB UI?  We
are currently using He=
ritrix 1.12.1.

We have a home-grown Spring MVC interface to monitor Heritr=
ix using
Spring's MBeanProxyFactoryBean to control remotely a bunch of
craw=
lers.  This is great for pausing, resuming and viewing reports but
we would=
 like to also have a way to use our interface to add Regex
style rules via =
JMX for times when a crawler hits a trap in mid-crawl.
 Currently we have t=
o go to the Heritrix WEB UI to make these changes.
 Specifically it would b=
e useful to be able to remotely add
RegexDecideRules to the "scope" setting=
 of the crawl and
uri-canonicalization-rules within domain overrides.

Than=
ks!

Adam
